content.prompt:
© Richard List/Corbis

The shape of the Lanzón Stela at Chavín de Huántar seems to have been purposefully chosen by the artist to reference

choices.label: a geometric form associated with the cosmos
an agricultural tool associated with fertility
a projectile weapon associated with warfare
a fishlike animal associated with rebirth

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
